# üë®‚Äçüíª About Me

Hi, I'm **Maximilian Marggraf**, a Fullstack Engineer based in Berlin, Germany.

I specialize in building highly modular, scalable, and maintainable applications, from enterprise e-commerce solutions to high throughput server applications. With deep experience in PHP, Databases and DevOps tools like Docker and GitLab CI.

- üíº 4+ years professional experience as Fullstack Engineer
- üî≠ Day Job focusing on PHP (Symfony, DI, Worker, Performance), Vue.js, and Docker
- üìö Actively learning Go & Java (Hyped for Hytale)
- üå± I enjoy gardening and building things outside techs
